LanguageData.MutaniteCentrifugeRunModeDesc: Enable or disable 'high yield' mode. This makes the centrifuge more efficent and faster, but dangerous to be around
LanguageData.NotEnoughStorageSpaceToTagPK: there is not enough storage to tag {0}
LanguageData.AnimalNotTaggable: {0} is too genetically corrupted to be added
LanguageData.ChamberDatabaseIgnoresDataLimitTooltip: if true, adding things to the chamber database will not require data storage, useful for debugging
LanguageData.PMDatabaseWithoutPower: Genebanks have lost power, cannot record new data
LanguageData.PMSheepChefLetter: Between frantic bleats, the sheep that has arrived at the colony appears to say he's a celebrity chef. He can cook excellent meals if you'll let him stay.
LanguageData.FactionLeaderTransformedContent: {memberName}, former {leaderTitle} of the {factionName}, was turned into a {species} and can no longer lead. They've been replaced by {newLeader}.
LanguageData.RelatedWildFormerHumanContent: {0} is a former human related to {1} and has appeared on the map. They may still need to be tamed. They are {1}'s {2}.
LanguageData.RelatedSoldFormerHumanContent: {0} is a former human related to {1} and has appeared as part of a morph trader's stock. You can buy them if you want. They are {1}'s {2}.
LanguageData.FormerHumanConflicted_TransitionContent: [PAWN_nameDef] sapience has dropped to the point they are no longer considered a full colonist
LanguageData.LetterChaomorphPasses: A group of {0}s has wandered into the area. They will stay for a while and then leave. You can choose to hunt, tame or revert them if you have the serum for it.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromTransformationBond: {0} has turned into a {1}! \n\n {0} has bonded with {2} because of their good relationship.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromPermanentTF: There is no visible change in {0}'s body as the mutagenic mechanites in their system simultaneously purge their memory of the original form. {0} can no longer be turned human with reversion serum -- they will remain an animal forever now.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromDietChange: {0}'s diet has now changed to be a {1}! Remember to feed them right.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromEtherBond: Constant production has caused {0} to accept change, and for some reason will now enjoy producing.
LanguageData.LetterHediffFromEtherBroken: Constant production has caused {0} to become numb and submit to their fate.
LanguageData.TransformationStageWarningLabel: {0} is at risk of fully changing very soon.
LanguageData.TransformationStageWarningContent: {0} is at risk of transforming into an animal soon. You can use stabilizer to prevent this
LanguageData.PMCarryToChamberMerge: Carry {1_label} to mutagen chamber for merging
LanguageData.MessagePawnResurrectedTransformed: {0} was resurrected, but the mechanite infusion in the serum brought them back as a {2}!
LanguageData.PMNoStorageAvailableForGenome: Cannot store {MUTATION} in the chamber database
LanguageData.SummaryAddedMutation: Adding \"[MUTATION_NAME]\" mutation to [PAWN_nameDef]'s [MUTATION_PART] at a severity of [MUTATION_SEVERITY].
LanguageData.enableFalloutCheckboxTooltip: Toggles a special fallout event that can spawn and mutate exposed pawns.
LanguageData.enableMutagenCheckboxTooltip: Toggles a new ship part type that mutates pawns in an expanding radius.
LanguageData.enableMutagenDiseasesCheckboxTooltip: Toggles mutagenic disease events that will morph pawns. (requires restart)
LanguageData.enableMutagenMeteorCheckboxTooltip: Toggles the ability of mutonite meteors to mutate nearby pawns.
LanguageData.enableWildFormersCheckboxTooltip: Toggles animals spawning onto the map as former humans, allowing them to be reverted.
LanguageData.PMHazardousChaobulbsTooltip: if failed chaobulb harvests can give mutagenic buildup
LanguageData.transformChanceSliderLabel: Chance for mutagens to fully transform pawns
LanguageData.formerChanceSliderLabel: Chance for animals to spawn as former humans
LanguageData.partialChanceSliderLabel: Chance for morph eggs/milk to trigger a complete transformation instead of a single mutation
LanguageData.maxMutationThoughtsSliderLabel: How many mutation related thoughts will show up at once
LanguageData.friendlyManhunterTfChance: Chance for friendly pawns to go manhunter when transformed
LanguageData.manhunterTfChance: Chance for pawns to go manhunter when transformed
LanguageData.PMInjectorsRequireTaggingTooltip: If tagging animals is requires to make injectors
LanguageData.CannotTagFormerHuman: Due to mechanite contamination, this animal cannot be tagged
LanguageData.PMMutationNotEnoughSpace: {animal} has mutations that can be recorded but not enough space to store them
LanguageData.PPAddingMutationDesc: Adding {MUTATION} mutation to {PAWN_nameDef}'s {PART} at a severity of {SEVERITY}
